description:
Gretl Is a cross-platform software package for econometric analysis, written in the C programming language.

It is free, open-source software. You may redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License (GPL) as published by the Free Software Foundation.
summary: Gretl is an econometrics package, including a shared library, a command-line client program and agraphical user interface.
author: Allin Cottrell,  Riccardo Lucchetti
